key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to material shortages and rising costs
Regulatory risks from stricter environmental and safety regulations
Economic sensitivity tied to housing market and construction activity
Geopolitical risks from U.S.-China trade tensions
Legal disputes including patent infringement and labor disputes
controversies: Patent infringement lawsuit (A. O. Smith Corporation v. Bradford White Corporation)
Labor disputes (Smith Steel Workers v. A. O. Smith Corporation)
environmental_issues: Sustainability commitments to reduce water usage and carbon footprint
social_issues: Challenges with labor unions and unfair labor practices
governance_issues: Legal disputes and potential financial liabilities
